summary: VEHICLE HEADLIGHTS HAVE A PULSATING PROBLEM CAUSING NIGHT DRIVING TO BE VERY DIFFICULT.  *MR  THE CONSUMER STATED THE PULSATING OF THE HEADLIGHTS CAUSES THE DRIVER TO THINK THERE IS A REFLECTION OF SOMETHING ON THE HIGHWAY.   THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD IT IS A CHARACTERISTIC OF THE VAN.  THE PCM WAS REPLACED.*JB
